overview_of_class: In this class, we will cover hypothesis tests and confidence intervals under both regression with a single regressor and multiple regression, nonlinear regression functions, and regression with a binary dependent variable, among other topics. We will also complete multiple computer problem sets involving Stata.
name: Introduction to Applied Econometrics
title: WCAS ECON 281-0-20 Introduction to Applied Econometrics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: In this class, we will cover hypothesis tests and confidence intervals under both regression with a single regressor and multiple regression, nonlinear regression functions, and regression with a binary dependent variable, among other topics. We will also complete multiple computer problem sets involving Stata.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Grades will be based on problem sets, two midterm exams, and a final exam.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value: We will use Introduction to Econometrics by James H. Stock and Mark W. Watson (Third Edition). ISBN-13: 978-0138009007.

subject: ECON
